variants.name: Outline

variants.description: Icons with partial fills for a modern, sophisticated look

variants.name: Broken

variants.name: Light
variants.description: Light stroke icons, clean and minimal design

variants.name: TwoTone
variants.description: Two-tone style icons with depth and dimension

communication.description: Icons for messaging, calls, and communication features

file.label: Files & Documents

commerce.label: E-Commerce & Shopping
commerce.description: Icons for shopping, payments, and e-commerce

action.label: Actions & Operations
action.description: Icons for user actions and operations

security.label: Security & Authentication
security.description: Icons for security, authentication, and privacy

data.label: Data & Analytics
data.description: Icons for data visualization, charts, and analytics

time.label: Time & Calendar
time.description: Icons for time, dates, and calendar events

location.label: Location & Maps
